name: "figure" by Siegfried Gross( Wed Jan 15th, 2020 )
description: Since 2019 ( The Year My Father Died ), I have been training the AI model in his sculpting style. The dataset consists of his 60 years of creative work. My father will achieve the fullness of artistic immortality as an autonomous artist in the cloud. The GIF shows the first steps of training the model. Machine Learning.
